item.title: Another shot for you from White Sands National Monument - the largest gypsum dune field in the world. It's in the middle of nowhere in southern New Mexico, but it's SO worth visiting. Even at sunset, the sand dunes never felt crowded, allowing for shots
item.description:
Another shot for you from White Sands National Monument - the largest gypsum dune field in the world. It's in the middle of nowhere in southern New Mexico, but it's SO worth visiting. Even at sunset, the sand dunes never felt crowded, allowing for shots

Another shot for you from White Sands National Monument - the largest gypsum dune field in the world. It's in the middle of nowhere in southern New Mexico, but it's SO worth visiting. Even at sunset, the sand dunes never felt crowded, allowing for shots like this.

item.title: Why Travel Blogging Needs More Storytelling - Legal Nomads
item.description:
Why Travel Blogging Needs More Storytelling - Legal Nomads

A few days ago, I presented the closing keynote for TBEX Asia about the power of story. It was an honour to get up in front of a group people dedicated to being better at what they do, and to speak about a topic that I truly believe in.

item.title: Portugal - 115 Beautiful Places From North To South | Nomad Revelations Travel Blog
item.description:
Portugal - 115 Beautiful Places From North To South | Nomad Revelations Travel Blog

Cradle of world history, Portugal is an unique travel destination. It is interesting how such a small country offers such a variety of landscapes, history, architecture and gastronomy. To visit Portugal is a great and unforgettable experience.

item.title: A Walk Down St. Laurent Blvd., Montreal
item.description:
A Walk Down St. Laurent Blvd., Montreal

Baharak and I like to pick a neighbourhood, somewhere in and around our hometown of Montreal, and spend the day like a tourist. We explore, wander, try a coffee shop or pub and spend an afternoon getting to know a local spot. Last week we decided on a visit to one of Montreal's most famous streets, St.

item.title: Getting Started with The Grid
item.description:
Getting Started with The Grid

a little introduction - kicking off a new platform, one where I'll share tidbits on travel and building a Lifestyle business.
